entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort McPherson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 39. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Partly cloudy. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
